Your Personalized Recovery Plan

From your answers I see that nutrition is a key lever right now, especially around protein, iron, and healthy fats. This plan focuses on simple breakfasts to steady energy, practical iron support, and clean omega-3s to restore balance. These shifts are designed to help move you from peak shedding toward stabilization, giving your follicles a calmer, stronger base. ðŸŒ±
